page.title: 17Recreation in Whittlesey
page.content: The general picture was that people lived in Whittlesey but often went out -side the town for their entertainment and recreation. The town has one large park with an open-air swimming pool, sports hall and football pitches. The pool is open in the summer months and is solar heated. Several smaller parks and playing fields are around the town. The parks are mostly used by younger children. The teenagers can go to one of two clubs or join any of the youth organisations represented in the town. Whittlesey has many good pubs some of which serve hot food. The nearest cinemas, theatre, discos indoor swimming pool and football team are in Peterborough and a large percentage of the people of Whittlesey go there to use them on a fairly regular basis.
